name: Agent Rick
description:
Agent rick is trapped in a strange building. You must kill all enemies to escape. This is a small idea I came up with while reading the CopperCube 6 FPS tutorial. Should I continue this?

Made with the Free Edition of CopperCube 6.

SFX & Music found from FREE sources such as FreeSound.ORG or OpenGameArt listed as CC0.

Models & Textures were included with the engine.
